data.event: The history of the municipality dates back to 1838, when Sund was first established as a formannskapsdistrikt, the precursor of the modern municipalities.

event.title: was established as a formannskapsdistrikt (municipality) on 1 January 1838

data.event: The parish of Sund was established as a formannskapsdistrikt (municipality) on 1 January 1838.

event.title: 1 January 1886, the southern island district of Sund (population: 2,396) was separated

data.event: On 1 January 1886, the southern island district of Sund (population: 2,396) was separated to form the new municipality of Austevoll.
